page.title: 05COOPERS' COBORN SCHOOL PT II
page.content: The school plays an active part in the life of Upminster.The Charity term for example gives everybody in the school the chance to raise money for a local charity and many pupils do community service. School for me means a lot of hard work with some fun and games thrown in. Celebrations are planned to mark 450 years since the foundation of Coopers' Company School.These include giving everybody a decorative plate and a book of the history of the school as well as a pageant.A commemorative service in St.Paul's Cathederal will continue the link between the school and the City of London Livery Companies from which the school derives its name and origin. The school looks forward to its 900th anniversary.
